description: Digital sum (in base 10) of numbers in base 3 of the alternate number system.
comments: The alternate number system has no need for the digit zero.
references: Robert R. Forslund, A Logical Alternative to the Existing Positional Number System, Southwest Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics. Vol. 1 1995 pp. 27-29.
links: R. R. Forslund, A logical alternative to the existing positional number system, Southwest Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics, 1995 Vol. 1.
EMIS, Mirror site for Southwest Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics
author: Bob Forslund (forslund(AT)tbaytel.net)
